SKT_FIRST.name: Dormouse Whiskers
SKT_FIRST.true_desc: Attacks an enemy and has a <color=#28d9ed>70%</color> chance to increase <color=#28d9ed>Evasion</color> for <color=#28d9ed>1 turn(s)</color>.
SKT_FIRST.true_desc_kr: 적을 공격하고 <color=#28d9ed>70%</color> 확률로 자신의 <color=#28d9ed>회피</color>를 <color=#28d9ed>1턴</color> 동안 증가시킵니다.
SKT_FIRST.true_desc_jp: 敵単体にダメージを与え、<color=#28d9ed>70%</color>の確率で自分の<color=#28d9ed>回避</color>を<color=#28d9ed>1ターン</color>の間UPさせる。

SKT_SECOND.name: Hatter's Teacup
SKT_SECOND.name_jp: 帽子屋さんのティーカップ
SKT_SECOND.true_desc: When using this skill, has a <color=#28d9ed>70%</color> chance to remove <color=#28d9ed>1</color> <color=#28d9ed>buff(s)</color> from all enemies, then attacks them.\nAfter attacking, inflicts reduced <color=#28d9ed>Effectiveness</color> for <color=#28d9ed>1 turn(s)</color> on all enemies and inflicts reduced <color=#28d9ed>Speed</color> on water enemies.\nIncreases <color=#28d9ed>Priority</color> by <color=#28d9ed>25%</color> for every target that was inflicted damage.
SKT_SECOND.true_desc_kr: 스킬 사용 시 <color=#28d9ed>70%</color> 확률로 적 전체의 <color=#28d9ed>강화 효과</color>를 <color=#28d9ed>1개</color> 해제하고 적 전체를 공격합니다.\n공격 후 <color=#28d9ed>1턴</color> 동안 적 전체의 <color=#28d9ed>효과 적중</color>을 감소시키고, 수속성 적의  <color=#28d9ed>속도</color>를 <color=#28d9ed>1턴</color> 감소시킵니다. 피해를 준 대상마다 자신의 <color=#28d9ed>행동 게이지</color>가 <color=#28d9ed>25%</color> 증가합니다.
SKT_SECOND.true_desc_jp: スキル使用時、<color=#28d9ed>70%</color>の確率で敵全体の<color=#28d9ed>強化効果</color>を<color=#28d9ed>1個</color>解除し、敵全体にダメージを与える。\n攻撃後、敵全体の<color=#28d9ed>効果命中</color>を<color=#28d9ed>1ターン</color>の間DOWNさせ、水属水属性敵の <color=#28d9ed>スピード</color>を<color=#28d9ed>1ターン</color>の間DOWNさせる。 ダメージを与えた対象の数に応じて自分の<color=#28d9ed>行動ゲージ</color>が<color=#28d9ed>25%</color>UPする。

SKT_BURST_1.effect: Increases damage\nReduces Alice in Wonderland Cooldown by 1 turn
SKT_BURST_1.effect_jp: ダメージUP\n【アリス・イン・ワンダーランド】\nスキルターン-1ターン

SKT_BURST_2.effect_jp: 強化解除強化\n(効果抵抗無視)

SKT_BURST_3.effect: Changed to Enhanced Skill\nResets Alice In Wonderland! Cooldown
SKT_BURST_3.effect_kr: 강화 스킬로 교체\n앨리스 인 원더랜드 쿨타임 초기화
SKT_BURST_3.effect_jp: 強化スキルに変更\n【アリス・イン・ワンダーランド】\nスキルターン初期化

SKT_ULTIMATE.name: Alice In Wonderland
SKT_ULTIMATE.name_jp: アリス・イン・ワンダーランド
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc:
Attacks all enemies and has a <color=#28d9ed>70%</color> chance to inflict <color=#28d9ed>Unbuffable</color> for <color=#28d9ed>2 turn(s)</color>. 
Applies <color=#28d9ed>Execution Time!</color> for <color=#28d9ed>2turn(s)</color>.

<color=#28d9ed>Execution time!</color>: Increases damage taken from Earth enemies.
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc_kr:
적 전체를 공격하고 <color=#28d9ed>70%</color> 확률로 대상에게 <color=#28d9ed>강화 불가</color>를 <color=#28d9ed>2턴</color> 동안 부여합니다.
또한 <color=#28d9ed>사형! 사형!</color>를 <color=#28d9ed>2턴</color> 동안 부여합니다.

<color=#28d9ed>사형! 사형!</color>: 지속성 적에게 받는 피해 증가.
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc_jp:
敵全体にダメージを与え、<color=#28d9ed>70%</color>の確率で対象に<color=#28d9ed>強化不可</color>を<color=#28d9ed>2ターン</color>の間付与する。
また、<color=#28d9ed>処刑!処刑!</color>を<color=#28d9ed>2ターン</color>間付与する。

<color=#28d9ed>処刑!処刑!</color>: 地属性の敵から受けるダメージUP(解除不可)

SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.name: Chain Passive
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc: <color=#ffd732>Chain Companion Effect</color>: After attacking, removes <color=#28d9ed>1 buff(s)</color> from all enemies.\n\n<color=#ffd732>Dual Attack Effect</color>: After attacking, has a <color=#28d9ed>100%</color> chance to increase <color=#28d9ed>Evasion</color> for <color=#28d9ed>2 turn(s)</color>.
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc_kr: <color=#ffd732>체인 컴패니언 효과</color> : 공격 후 적 전체의 강화 효과를 <color=#28d9ed>1개</color> 해제합니다.\n\n<color=#ffd732>협공 효과</color> : 공격 후 <color=#28d9ed>100%</color> 확률로 <color=#28d9ed>2턴</color> 동안 <color=#28d9ed>회피</color>가 증가합니다.
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc_jp: <color=#ffd732>チェーン効果(汎用)</color>:攻撃後、敵全体の強化効果を<color=#28d9ed>1個</color>解除する。\n\n<color=#ffd732>連携効果</color>:攻撃後、<color=#28d9ed>100%</color>の確率で<color=#28d9ed>回避</color>が<color=#28d9ed>2ターン</color>の間UPする。

2: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
2_jp: チェーンスキルと連携ダメージ+5%
3: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
3_jp: チェーンスキルと連携ダメージ+5%
4: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
4_jp: チェーンスキルと連携ダメージ+5%
5: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
5_jp: チェーンスキルと連携ダメージ+5%
